summary.span: 包含为使用 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 生成的应用程序和服务提供配置的类。

span.span: Contains classes that provide configuration for applications and services built using the Windows Identity Foundation (WIF).

summary.span: 此命名空间中的类表示 <identityConfiguration> 元素下的设置。

span.span: The classes in this namespace represent settings under the <identityConfiguration> element.

summary.span: 使用 WS-Federation 协议配置联合的类主要包含在 命名空间中。

span.span: Classes that configure federation using the WS-Federation protocol are contained primarily in the namespace.

summary.span: 这些设置显示在配置文件的 <system.identityModel.services> 元素下。

span.span: These settings appear under the <system.identityModel.services> element in a configuration file.
